blogs.title: KR$NA is best rapper in India
blogs.body: Starting is rap career from 1998, KR$NA the OG has grinded a lot in the field of rap and have gained a lot of experience in the game. He has made a lot of tracks on different genres like trap, protest, poetry, beef, drill etc. He is most known for his fearless attitude in diss tracks and insane level of lyricism in his rap.
blogs.author: Ujjawal
